headline: North America Automotive Robotics Market Forecast and Company Analysis Report 2025-2033 Featuring ABB, Rockwell, Yaskawa, Fanuc, Harmonic Drive Systems, Nachi-Fujikoshi, Universal Robots, Comau
summary: The North America Automotive Robotics Market is set to surge from US$ 3.05 billion in 2024 to US$ 7.09 billion by 2033, growing at a CAGR of 9.81%. Key drivers include the growing demand for automation, enhanced AI and machine learning, and Industry 4.0 adoption. These factors are boosting production efficiency and precision while cutting labor costs. headline: Rockwell Automation (ROK) Stock Benefits From Tariff Relief Prospects
summary: Rockwell Automation Inc. (NYSE:ROK) ranks among the stocks to benefit from an onshoring boom. On July 15, KeyBanc maintained its Overweight rating on Rockwell Automation Inc. (NYSE:ROK) shares, while increasing its price objective for the company from $360 to $370. The firm was upbeat regarding the possible improvement in Rockwell’s fiscal third-quarter 2025 earnings.
